casebody.data:
Nicholl Jackson, an Incapacitated Person By Her Court Appointed Co-Guardians, Arlene Hinkle, Theresa Caines
v.
Allegheny Valley School 37 NO. 17 EAL 2016 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania May 04, 2016 Appeal from the Superior Court.

Justice WECHT did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.

Disposition: Denied.
